metadata.name: Public DNS Zones
metadata.description: This module deploys a Public DNS zone.
Optional. Specify the name of lock.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
Optional. The name (as GUID) of the role assignment. If not provided, a GUID will be generated.

Required. The role to assign. You can provide either the display name of the role definition, the role definition GUID, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container".
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.

Optional. A reference to an azure resource from where the dns resource value is taken. Also known as an alias record sets and are only supported for record types A, AAAA and CNAME. A resource ID can be an Azure Traffic Manager, Azure CDN, Front Door, Static Web App, or a resource ID of a record set of the same type in the DNS zone (i.e. A, AAAA or CNAME). Cannot be used in conjuction with the "aRecords" property.
Required. The IPv4 address of this A record.
Optional. The list of A records in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.

Optional. A reference to an azure resource from where the dns resource value is taken. Also known as an alias record sets and are only supported for record types A, AAAA and CNAME. A resource ID can be an Azure Traffic Manager, Azure CDN, Front Door, Static Web App, or a resource ID of a record set of the same type in the DNS zone (i.e. A, AAAA or CNAME). Cannot be used in conjuction with the "aRecords" property.
Required. The IPv6 address of this AAAA record.
Optional. The list of AAAA records in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.

Optional. A reference to an azure resource from where the dns resource value is taken. Also known as an alias record sets and are only supported for record types A, AAAA and CNAME. A resource ID can be an Azure Traffic Manager, Azure CDN, Front Door, Static Web App, or a resource ID of a record set of the same type in the DNS zone (i.e. A, AAAA or CNAME). Cannot be used in conjuction with the "aRecords" property.
Required. The canonical name of the CNAME record.
Optional. The CNAME record in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The flags for this CAA record as an integer between 0 and 255.
Required. The tag for this CAA record..
Required. The value for this CAA record.
Optional. The list of CAA records in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The domain name of the mail host for this MX record.
Required. The preference value for this MX record.
Optional. The list of MX records in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The name server name for this NS record.
Optional. The list of NS records in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The PTR target domain name for this PTR record.
Optional. The list of PTR records in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The email contact for this SOA record.
Required. The expire time for this SOA record.
Required. The domain name of the authoritative name server for this SOA record.
Required. The minimum value for this SOA record. By convention this is used to determine the negative caching duration.
Required. The refresh value for this SOA record.
Required. The retry time for this SOA record.
Required. The serial number for this SOA record.
Optional. The SOA record in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The priority value for this SRV record.
Required. The weight value for this SRV record.
Required. The port value for this SRV record.
Required. The target domain name for this SRV record.
Optional. The list of SRV records in the record set.
Required. The name of the record.
Optional. The metadata of the record.
Optional. The TTL of the record.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Required. The text value of this TXT record.
Optional. The list of TXT records in the record set.
Required. DNS zone name.
Optional. Array of A records.
Optional. Array of AAAA records.
Optional. Array of CNAME records.
Optional. Array of CAA records.
Optional. Array of MX records.
Optional. Array of NS records.
Optional. Array of PTR records.
Optional. Array of SOA records.
Optional. Array of SRV records.
Optional. Array of TXT records.
Optional. The location of the dnsZone. Should be global.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. The lock settings of the service.
Optional. Enable/Disable usage telemetry for module.

properties.notes: [if(equals(tryGet(parameters('lock'), 'kind'), 'CanNotDelete'), 'Cannot delete resource or child resources.', 'Cannot delete or modify the resource or child resources.')]

metadata.name: Public DNS Zone A record
metadata.description: This module deploys a Public DNS Zone A record.
Optional. The name (as GUID) of the role assignment. If not provided, a GUID will be generated.

Required. The role to assign. You can provide either the display name of the role definition, the role definition GUID, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container".
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
Conditional. The name of the parent DNS zone. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Required. The name of the A record.
Optional. The list of A records in the record set. Cannot be used in conjuction with the "targetResource" property.
Optional. The metadata attached to the record set.
Optional. The TTL (time-to-live) of the records in the record set.

Optional. A reference to an azure resource from where the dns resource value is taken. Also known as an alias record sets and are only supported for record types A, AAAA and CNAME. A resource ID can be an Azure Traffic Manager, Azure CDN, Front Door, Static Web App, or a resource ID of a record set of the same type in the DNS zone (i.e. A, AAAA or CNAME). Cannot be used in conjuction with the "aRecords" property.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
The name of the deployed A record.
The resource ID of the deployed A record.
The resource group of the deployed A record.

Optional. The name (as GUID) of the role assignment. If not provided, a GUID will be generated.

Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
Conditional. The name of the parent DNS zone. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Required. The name of the AAAA record.
Optional. The list of AAAA records in the record set. Cannot be used in conjuction with the "targetResource" property.
Optional. The metadata attached to the record set.
Optional. The TTL (time-to-live) of the records in the record set.

Optional. A reference to an azure resource from where the dns resource value is taken. Also known as an alias record sets and are only supported for record types A, AAAA and CNAME. A resource ID can be an Azure Traffic Manager, Azure CDN, Front Door, Static Web App, or a resource ID of a record set of the same type in the DNS zone (i.e. A, AAAA or CNAME). Cannot be used in conjuction with the "aRecords" property.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
The name of the deployed AAAA record.
The resource ID of the deployed AAAA record.
The resource group of the deployed AAAA record.
